snippet: A New Jersey boy is accused in the deaths of two teenagers who were among five people shot and killed around Newark on Christmas Day, officials said.
abstract: Fifteen-year-old New Jersey boy is charged with murders of 13-year-old Zainee Hailey and 15-year-old Kasson Mormon in Newark on Christmas Day; murders are among five committed on same day, raising fresh concerns over public safety in city.
lead_paragraph: A New Jersey boy is accused in the deaths of two teenagers who were among five people shot and killed around Newark on Christmas Day, officials said.

headline.main: Boy, 15, Charged With Murders in Newark
headline.print_headline: Boy, 15, Charged With Murders in Newark
